channel.title: Dragon Claws Spec help =(

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec help =(
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

How would that help? It hits 0 for the first three every time correct?

Try adding a loop.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) { DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec help =(
item.dc:creator: @1_pk_ur_s0ul 1 pk ur s0ul
item.description:
@1_pk_ur_s0ul wrote:

Thanks for taking the time to look at my thread, I have an issue with my Dragon Claw special attack, It seems to only hit 1 time out of 4. such as 0-0-0-18. why is this?

Here is a Picture:

clawspec-1.jpg773×533

It Not only does this on NPC’s it hits like this on players aswell.

Here is my Client.Java Claws Special code,

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Everything seems correct but i hit consistently 0-0-0-(#) everytime? WHY!?!?!

Read full topic
